map.item:
In this experiment, your only task is to click the left mouse button whenever a target is presented on screen.
In each trial, a large colored box will be presented on screen for a brief period of time. Inside of that box will be a smaller box. Pay attention to the position of the smaller box.
If the small box appears on the [TARGET_SIDE] half of the larger box, and ONLY if it appears on the [TARGET_SIDE] half of the larger box, then it is a target and you should respond by clicking the left mouse button. If the smaller box appears in any other position, then it is not a target and you should make no response. The experiment may continue for a while, so do your best to pay attention and make correct responses until it is complete.
